trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Przedstawia <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> typów, aby [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> Skojarzonego z tym <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera klucz dostępu dla <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> skojarzonego z tym <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane przez <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Klucz dostępu dla <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera typ kontrolki dla <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> skojarzonego z tym <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane przez <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> Wartości wyliczenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję elementów podrzędnych <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> skojarzonego z tym <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane przez <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja elementów podrzędnych.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera nazwę <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> skojarzonego z tym <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane przez <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "MenuItem".
trans-unit.target: Ciąg, który zawiera "MenuItem".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera etykiety tekstowej <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> skojarzonego z tym <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane przez <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość name można traktować jako ciąg tekstowy, który użytkownik użyje, aby wyjaśnić, jest określana kontroli.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Ważne jest, aby mieć reprezentacji tekstowej dla wszystkich kontrolek w [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] , dzięki czemu można programowo odwołać się do formantu w sposób zlokalizowane.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: Ciąg, który zawiera etykietę.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wzorzec kontroli <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> skojarzonego z tym <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> object.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli wystąpi jedno z następujących przypadków, ta metoda zwraca bieżącą <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>obiektu.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` jest równe <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>skojarzonego z tym <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>ma podrzędny <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>obiektów.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> does not have child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` jest równe <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>skojarzonego z tym <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>nie ma podrzędnych <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>obiektów.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` jest równe <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>skojarzonego z tym <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>ustawioną właściwość dostępne do kontroli `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli `patternInterface` jest równe <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, ta metoda zwraca obiekt, który implementuje <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>interfejsu.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Jedna z wartości wyliczenia.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Obiekt, który obsługuje wzorca formantu, jeśli patternInterface jest obsługiwaną wartością; w przeciwnym razie .

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
